features.name: Home Page
features.description: 13-section landing page with Hero, Search, Why Co-Housing, Featured Properties, AI Committee, How It Works, Services, Testimonials, Blog Insights, CTA sections

features.name: Property Listings
features.description: Property search, filtering, listing display with cards, price ranges, locations, and property details

features.name: Property Details
features.description: Detailed property view with images, specs, amenities, location, developer info, and enquiry forms

features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Firebase authentication with phone/email login, registration, password reset, and profile management

features.name: AI Assistant
features.description: 6-agent AI investment committee with Market Pulse, Deal Underwriter, Developer Verifier, Legal Compliance, Exit Optimizer, and Committee Synthesizer

features.name: Subscription System
features.description: 4-tier subscription plans with Razorpay payment integration, plan management, and billing

features.name: User Profile
features.description: User dashboard with profile management, saved properties, investment history, and notifications

features.name: Contact & Enquiries
features.description: Contact forms, property enquiries, lead capture, and newsletter subscription

features.name: Blog System
features.description: Blog listing, article pages, categories, and content management

features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Admin panel with analytics, property management, user management, enquiry tracking, and CMS

features.name: Admin Property Management
features.description: CRUD operations for properties, media upload, developer management

features.name: Admin User Management
features.description: User listing, role management, subscription tracking

features.name: Admin AI Configuration
features.description: AI agent configuration and prompt management

features.name: Static Pages
features.description: About, Services, How It Works, FAQs, Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions

features.name: Header & Navigation
features.description: Main navigation header with responsive menu, user menu, and notifications

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Reusable UI components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS

features.name: Search & Filters
features.description: Property search with location, price, type, BHK, and status filters

features.name: Notifications System
features.description: Real-time notification center with alerts and updates
